Race.SpecificTitle: Cons. Utilities Dist. #1 -- 10 Mill - BOC - 25 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
CONSOLIDATED UTILITIES DISTRICT #1 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE)

SUMMARY:  25-YEAR 10-MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE WATERWORKS SYSTEM WITHIN THE ASCENSION CONSOLIDATED UTILITIES DISTRICT #1.
Race.FullText: Shall Ascension Consolidated Utilities District #1, State of Louisiana, levy a ten (10) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District for a period of twenty-five (25) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2031, inclusive, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating said district's waterworks system?
